wiki_section_title: Teams

wiki_section_text: There will be ten teams participating in this year 's national championship . The teams are to be announced .

intro: The 2013 United States Women's Curling Championship was held from February 9 to 16 at the Cornerstone Community Center in Green Bay, Wisconsin. It was held in conjunction with the 2013 United States Men's Curling Championship. The winning team will represent the United States at the 2013 World Women's Curling Championship in Riga, Latvia. The championship also acted as a qualifier to the 2014 United States Olympic Curling Trials, awarding a qualifying spot to the winners of the championship.

qa.question: What curler in the 2013 United States Women 's Curling Championship plays second , was born in May 1991 and plays with her sister ?
